title: Operative training
creator_credit: Cygnet Films and PA Management Consultants
brief_description: An illustration of the application of advanced training methods to increase productivity in industry and commerce. Various tests are made on suitability of a candidate whose skill and stamina are then built up to the required standard of an experienced operative.
